Pre-Game Insights: Wales are unbeaten in seven games under Rob Page, while Poland have lost three of their last four Euro qualifier matches played away from home.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This match will determine one of the last three slots available at Euro 2024.
Others: Wales have only lost one of their last 15 Euro qualifiers played at the Cardiff City Stadium. Robert Lewandowski has been directly involved in 24 goals in his last 27 appearances for Poland but has not scored in any of his three games against Wales.
